recommendations: Nuzeen Aziz “I've worked with Ayush on multiple business cases during my time in university, and he has never failed to impress. He brings to the table an impeccable understanding of business and finance concepts, and excellent problem-solving abilities. He is an effective communicator and is skilled in strategic and financial analysis. Most of all, Ayush is a good team player. There were times when he brought together students from diverse academic backgrounds and drove them toward a common goal. I'm sure he will excel in anything he takes up!”

volunteer_experience.info: Part of a 3 member executive board governing the debate and discourse in the Security Council Committee at the American University of Sharjah's annual MUN conference. Adjudged 30+ delegates from across the UAE.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: American University of Sharjah
volunteer_experience.title: Adjudicator, Model United Nations Conference

volunteer_experience.info: Part of the organizing team for Startup Weekend Umm Al Quwain,  a 60+ member meet organized in collaboration with the Mohammed Bin Rashid Innovation Fund, One Capital, and Global Venture Partners.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Startup Weekend
volunteer_experience.title: Organizer

volunteer_experience.info: Selected as the Chairperson for the Model United Nations Conference held at BITS Dubai, in the Security Council Committee, adjudicating 50+ high school and university students on their foreign policy, debate and deliberation skills in an enactment of the United Nations format.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Birla Institute Of Technology and Science, Pilani Dubai
volunteer_experience.title: Adjudicator, Model UN Conference

honors_and_awards.title: Best Delegate
honors_and_awards.publication: Amity University Dubai Model UN Conference
honors_and_awards.description: Representative of the Republic Turkey in the General Assembly with over 30 student delegates from across the UAE. Emerged as the Best Delegate after 5 sessions of debate.

honors_and_awards.title: Winner - Techstars Startup Weekend Dubai.
honors_and_awards.description: Techstars is a global startup accelerator that organized the Startup Weekend Dubai University Edition, a 54 hour intense conference that involved the organic formation of teams, preparation, and presentation of our startup pitches, business and revenue models. Was awarded the first position for a sustainable investments app, along with 3 other participants.

honors_and_awards.title: Moderator - AUSMUN 2018
honors_and_awards.description: Selected to chair and moderate the United Nations Security Council 2 committee at the American University of Sharjah's annual MUN conference. I wae responsible for judging 30+ delegates from NYUAD, AUS, AUD, ADU and other leading universities across the UAE.

honors_and_awards.title: High Commendation - Indian Institute of Management MUN 2016
honors_and_awards.description: Was bestowed with a High Commendation representing Saudi Arabia in the Human Rights Committee of the Model UN Conference hosted by one of India's most reputed business schools.

honors_and_awards.title: Best Delegate
honors_and_awards.description: Received the Best Delegate award for exceptional performance in the Indian Parliament of 1946 Committee at the Daly College Youth Parliament, 2016.

honors_and_awards.title: Secretary General's Best Delegate
